data.name: ben
data.value: Leo, how much would I have to pay you with love, affection, and praise for you to just sprint up that hill as far as you can go?

data.name: janet
data.value: Don't do it Leo there's no dollar signs in love, affection, and praise.

data.name: leo
data.value: Will you buy me Dairy Queen?

data.name: leo
data.value: At the end of this episode?

data.name: ben
data.value: Um yeah, that's on the way back right?

data.name: janet
data.value: Good job Leo, but, in the future, you ask ‘what's your budget’; never tell them the rate right away haha.
